entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as following a particular line.

entities.name: potterwatch
entities.description: A program that is not following You-Know-Who's line, and provides advice on how to treat dragonpox.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry Potter's friends, trying to tune into Potterwatch and guess the password.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Another one of Ron's friends, on guard duty in the tent.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Ron's brother, who had a knack for guessing passwords.

entities.name: dragonpox
entities.description: A disease that Potterwatch provides advice on how to treat.

entities.name: cauldron full of hot strong love
entities.description: A song that was played on the wireless.

entities.name: order
entities.description: An organization related to the password guessing.

relationships.description: Ron is trying to tune into Potterwatch.
The password guessing is related to the Order.
Bill's knack for guessing passwords is related to the Order.
Potterwatch provides advice on how to treat dragonpox, which affects Ron.
